titanium_law.clause_1: BANDS ARE DESCRIPTIVE. THEY DO NOT CHANGE EXECUTION AUTHORITY.
titanium_law.clause_2: TRIGGER CONDITIONS ARE DETERMINISTIC AND HIERARCHICAL (RED > ORANGE > YELLOW > GREEN).
titanium_law.clause_3: SAFETY FIRST: DEGRADED DATA DEFAULTS TO YELLOW OR ORANGE.

GREEN.triggers: Coherence > 90 AND Drift < 2 AND Thresholds Released

YELLOW.description: WATCH. Minor Drift or degraded coherence.

ORANGE.description: WARNING. Significant Drift or Threshold Tightening Active.

RED.description: CRITICAL. Low Coherence or Hard Limit Clamp.
